name: LD43 Santa Saves Christmas
description:
Santa is not Happy. 

The Elves gave him the wrong presents to deliver and now they have to go back and pick them up.

Help Santa pickup the Gifts and Coal that were mistakenly given to people and help save Christmas.

Controls

Left Mouse - Move Santa from Window to Window

Right Mouse - Sacrifice Elves to Pickup Things

How To Play

Move Santa from window to window on the Street to collect the items highlighted on the screen. You must be in the Sleigh and the end of the Street in order to complete the level. The bar at the top tells you how much Christmas spirit is left. Press the Sleigh Recall Button at the top if you sleigh get to far ahead of you. But don't use it too often because is uses lots of Magic and drain your Christmas Spirit.

Have Fun!

Paul
